softwareEngineer.h1: Career Coaching for Software Engineers Targeting $100K–$350K Roles
softwareEngineer.subtitle: Positioning, interview prep, and offer strategy built for software engineering roles.
softwareEngineer.supporting: We clarify your level, refine your narrative, and build the interview signal that wins senior SWE offers.
highlights: Role targeting from Senior → Staff → Principal
softwareEngineer.ctaProof: Built for backend, frontend, full‑stack, and platform engineers.

heroCard.title: SWE signal upgrade
heroCard.body: A focused system that positions your engineering impact at the right level.

items.title: Senior → Staff
items.body: Level‑up positioning built into your narrative.

items.title: Interview velocity
items.body: Clear role fit that drives recruiter response.

items.title: Offer leverage
items.body: Negotiation strategy tied to comp band.

steps.title: How software engineer coaching works
steps.subtitle: A structured approach from targeting to offer.

items.title: Define
items.body: Target level, scope, and comp range.

items.title: Position
items.body: Build resume, LinkedIn, and story bank.

items.title: Execute
items.body: Prep interviews and negotiate the offer.

for.title: This is for
for.body: Software engineers ready to move up in level and comp.
items: Adjacent roles: QA, platform, security engineering

notFor.title: Not a fit if
notFor.body: You want generic career advice or entry‑level prep.

items.title: SWE positioning brief
items.body: Clarify level, scope, and engineering narrative.

items.title: Resume + LinkedIn
items.body: Recruiter‑ready assets aligned to your target role.

items.title: Interview + offer prep
items.body: Story bank and negotiation strategy.

related.title: Pair with a service
related.body: Choose the right deliverable for your stage.

items.question: Do you help with system design interviews?
items.answer: Yes. We build system design narratives and practice for your target level.

items.question: Can you help me move from Senior to Staff?
items.answer: Yes. We focus on scope, ownership, and leadership signal.

items.question: Do you work with frontend or backend engineers?
items.answer: Yes. We tailor to your stack and role focus.

items.question: How long does the process take?
items.answer: Most clients see momentum in 2–6 weeks depending on package.

items.question: Can you rewrite my resume?
items.answer: Yes. Resume writing is included in brand packages or as a standalone.

items.question: Do you help with negotiation?
items.answer: Yes. Negotiation planning is part of interview and coaching packages.

items.question: What if I’m changing companies but not level?
items.answer: We still position your impact to maximize comp and role quality.

items.question: Is this only for Big Tech?
items.answer: No. We work across Big Tech, startups, and enterprise.

cta.title: Ready to level up your SWE role?
cta.body: Book a call and map your path to the next level.
cta.label: Book a Call
